text: Nikolai Archilovich Zabolotny (; born 16 April 1990) is a Russian football goalkeeper. He plays for PFC Sochi. ==Club career== He made his debut for the main FC Spartak Moscow squad on 2 April 2011 in a Russian Premier League game against FC Kuban Krasnodar.
